descriptions.owner: Full access to all features. Cannot be assigned via invitation - only the shop creator has this role.
descriptions.manager: Staff management, expense approval, and access to analytics. Can manage day-to-day operations.
descriptions.finance: Payroll, salary management, and financial reports. Focused on accounting and financial operations.
descriptions.staff: Sales, customer management, and basic operations. Standard team member access.

catalog.title: Catalog Settings
catalog.subtitle: Manage your product catalog reference data
catalog.categoriesDescription: Define product categories to organize your inventory
catalog.metalsDescription: Define metal types used in your jewelry products
catalog.puritiesDescription: Define purity levels for each metal type
catalog.stonesDescription: Define gemstone types used in your products
catalog.sizesDescription: Define product sizes organized by category

catalog.noStonesForCategory: No stones found in this category
catalog.noSizesDescription: Add product sizes organized by category
catalog.noSizesForCategory: No sizes defined for this category
catalog.deleteMetalWarning: This will delete the metal type. Purities linked to this metal must be deleted first.
catalog.deletePurityWarning: This will delete the metal purity. Items using this purity will be affected.
catalog.finenessTooltip: The fineness indicates parts per thousand (e.g., 999 for 24K gold)
catalog.deleteStoneWarning: This will delete the stone type. Items using this stone will be affected.
catalog.mohsHardnessTooltip: The Mohs scale measures mineral hardness from 1 (talc) to 10 (diamond)
catalog.deleteSizeWarning: This will delete the size. Items using this size will be affected.
catalog.sizeValueTooltip: The actual measurement value in the selected system
catalog.sortOrderTooltip: Lower numbers appear first in lists
catalog.deleteCategoryWarning: This will delete the category. Items in this category must be moved first.

marketing.heroTitle: Manage Your Jewelry Business with Ease
marketing.heroSubtitle: The all-in-one platform for inventory management, sales tracking, customer relationships, and business analytics designed specifically for jewelry businesses.
marketing.feature1Desc: Track every piece with detailed attributes including metal type, weight, stones, and more. Real-time stock updates and low inventory alerts.
marketing.feature2Desc: Process sales quickly with our intuitive point of sale system. Generate professional invoices and manage payments effortlessly.
marketing.feature3Desc: Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive reports on sales, inventory turnover, customer behavior, and business performance.
marketing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of jewelry businesses already using Aymur to streamline their operations.
